attributes.action: Extend theory test expiry dates if you have had tests booked and been cancelled
attributes.additional_details: Due to the Covid 19 lockdowns, months of driving tests have been cancelled for learner drivers. Many learners’ theory certificates will expire due to the difficulties in booking driving tests in 2020 and 202. As a result, the government should extend the theory test certificate’s validity so these learners are punished no further.
attributes.background: The government should extend the expiry dates on theory tests. As people have had 1 to 2 tests cancelled in 2020/2021, and have not had the chance to take their tests.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend driving theory test certificates expiring in 2020/21 by 12 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160

Make driving theory tests available to take online: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570878

Fund driving theory resits caused by coronavirus restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564297

Refund driving theory tests that expire during COVID-19 pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571379
